uvi.description:
drm/amdgpu: fix out of bounds write

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.16 by commit d3ed72495a59fbfb9377450c8dfe94389a6509a7. For more details please see the references link.
